short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The Copy Me official chrome extension.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The Copy Me helps you to copy your texts, files, contents, links, and youtube videos between your devices with just a single tap.
Still, using a messaging app to transfer data between devices ?. Tired of using Bluetooth or wifi transferring apps ?. This app for you!.

No Ads. Premium app for only $1.99 per month. Worry about the content you copied. We are protecting your information and all the text is encrypted. Using advanced technology to provide you better user experience. why are you waiting for?. download this app !.
